QuestData.Title: A Song of Frost and Fire
QuestData.Description: You have rescued many of my clan from the slave pens of Tanaan. Their liberation and the destruction of the Dark Portal are more than enough for me to consider you one of us.$b$bHowever, you are still a stranger to our leader, Durotan. I would like to introduce you to him.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you for returning with my people, and I welcome you as an honored guest.
